lead_paragraph: Two other people were still missing after a small ferryboat sank on New Year’s Eve.

headline.print_headline: Egypt: 15 Bodies Are Recovered After Ferry Sinks in Nile River
headline.main: Egypt: 15 Bodies Are Recovered After Ferry Sinks in Nile River

snippet: Two other people were still missing after a small ferryboat sank on New Year’s Eve.
abstract: Egyptian authorities report recovery of man's body, one of 15 people killed when small unlicensed ferry sank in Nile River on New Years Eve.
